channel.title: Chat Interface Recommendation
channel.description: After 305 hours of game time, I would like to have more customizable options with the chat box. E.g. Multiple windows to seperate general message with whisper or even if it is a tab that blinks, or the option to choose either or. After 4 games within 2 hours of being King, the massive amount of whispers with the general chat and people randomly accusing others it is difficult to manage every detail.

item.title: Chat Interface Recommendation
item.dc:creator: slappy
item.description:
I think it replicates the chaos of how a court might have been 600 years ago.

You can still navigate and read whispers in the [view history] tab and still read the general chat on the bottom left, all the while moving your log to the side to type in claims. It works pretty well already, just have to practice moving stuff around a little
